name: Game Dev + Existential Crisis
description:
In this game you are an unnamed game developer, who wants to make a game. You can make a game, or just explore your house. Your choice. You have no obligation to make a game.  

And remember this game is guaranteed to have at least two endings! So, go out of your way to find them! Or don't.

This was made by me as a team of one, and was also my first time doing competent 3d modelling so yeah.

Controls:

* Internally monologue about inanimate objects with Left Click

* Interact with certain objects by Right Clicking

* Go through doors by clicking on the doorknob

* Move with WASD

* Go to the main menu with the escape key

Disclaimer:

It might take a few seconds for the game to load after the play button is pressed, so be patient please.

Extra Information;

I used a tutorial by Brackey's on how to make an audio manager, along with unity's first person character, I also used several tracks of music from Ultimate Game Music Collection, and one sound effect from Universal Sound Effects.

Also just unzip the file and open the application found within to play.

Important Note:

Please use version 1.01, it fixes a game experience hampering bug.
